    [Algorithm] 5. 스택

    2 분 소요

    On This Page

    • 스택 (Stack) : 후입선출 (LIFO)로 데이터를 처리하는 자료구조
    • BOJ 2504번. 괄호의 값 (G5)
    • BOJ 4949번. 균형잡힌 세상 (S4)
    • BOJ 9012번. 괄호 (S4)
    • BOJ 10773번. 제로 (S4)
    • BOJ 10828번. 스택 (S4)
    • BOJ 12789번. 도키도키 간식드리미 (S3)
    • BOJ 28278번. 스택 2 (S4)

    스택 (Stack) : 후입선출 (LIFO)로 데이터를 처리하는 자료구조

    BOJ 2504번. 괄호의 값 (G5)

    import re
import sys
from collections import deque

read = sys.stdin.readline

S = deque(str(read()))

while S.__len__() != 2:
    S = ''.join(S)
    if '()' in S:
        S = S.replace('()', '2,')
    elif '[]' in S:
        S = S.replace('[]', '3,')
    else:
        if ',' in S:
            if ',)' in S:
                p = re.compile("([0-9]+,)")
                rel = p.findall(S)
                S = re.sub("([0-9]+,)", str(int(rel[0]) * 2), S)
                print(S)



    S = deque(S)

print(S[0])

# (()[[]])([])
# (2,[3,])(3,)
# (2,9,)6
# (11)6
# 22,6
# 28

    BOJ 4949번. 균형잡힌 세상 (S4)

    import sys
from collections import deque

read = sys.stdin.readline
S = read().rstrip()


while S != ".":
    D = deque()
    flag = 0

    for i in S:
        if i == ".":
            break
        elif i == "(":
            D.append("(")
        elif i == ")":
            if D.__len__() == 0:
                flag += 1
                break
            else:
                chk = D.pop()
                if chk == "(":
                    continue
                else:
                    flag += 1
                break
        elif i == "[":
            D.append("[")
        elif i == "]":
            if D.__len__() == 0:
                flag += 1
                break
            else:
                chk = D.pop()
                if chk == "[":
                    continue
                else:
                    flag += 1
                    break

    if flag == 1 or D.__len__() != 0:
        print("no")
    else:
        print("yes")

    S = read().rstrip()

    BOJ 9012번. 괄호 (S4)

    import sys
read = sys.stdin.readline

T = int(read())

for i in range(T):
    S = str(read())
    S = S.replace("\n", "")
    while len(S) != 0:
        if "()" in S:
            S = S.replace("()", "")
        else:
            break

    if len(S) == 0:
        print("YES")
    else:
        print("NO")

    BOJ 10773번. 제로 (S4)

    import sys
from collections import deque

read = sys.stdin.readline

K = int(read())
S = deque()

for i in range(K):
    R = int(read())
    if R == 0:
        S.pop()
    else:
        S.append(R)

print(sum(S))

    BOJ 10828번. 스택 (S4)

    import sys
from collections import deque

read = sys.stdin.readline

N = int(read())
S = deque()

for i in range(N):
    C = read().split()
    if C[0] == "push":
        S.append(C[1])
    elif C[0] == "top":
        if len(S) == 0:
            print(-1)
        else:
            print(S[len(S) - 1])
    elif C[0] == "size":
        print(len(S))
    elif C[0] == "empty":
        if len(S) == 0:
            print(1)
        else:
            print(0)
    elif C[0] == "pop":
        if len(S) != 0:
            print(S[len(S) - 1])
            S.pop()
        else:
            print(-1)

    BOJ 12789번. 도키도키 간식드리미 (S3)

    import sys
from collections import deque

read = sys.stdin.readline

N = int(read())
stack1 = deque(map(int, read().split()))
stack2 = deque()

index = 1
for i in range(0, N):
    temp = stack1.popleft()
    if index == temp:
        index += 1
    else:
        stack2.append(temp)

    if stack2.__len__() != 0:
        if stack2[-1] == index:
            for j in range(stack2.__len__() - 1, -1, -1):
                if index == stack2[-1]:
                    stack2.pop()
                    index += 1
                else:
                    break

for i in range(0, len(stack2)):
    if i == index:
        index += 1
        stack2.pop()
    else:
        break

if stack1.__len__() == 0 and stack2.__len__() == 0:
    print('Nice')
else:
    print('Sad')

    BOJ 28278번. 스택 2 (S4)

    import sys
from collections import deque

read = sys.stdin.readline

N = int(read())
stack = deque()

for i in range(N):
    command = read().split()
    if command[0] == '1':
        stack.append(command[1])
    elif command[0] == '2':
        if stack.__len__() != 0:
            print(stack.pop())
        else:
            print(-1)
    elif command[0] == '3':
        print(stack.__len__())
    elif command[0] == '4':
        if stack.__len__() == 0:
            print(1)
        else:
            print(0)
    elif command[0] == '5':
        if stack.__len__() != 0:
            print(stack[-1])
        else:
            print(-1)

    태그: Algorithm
